Name: Scarlett O'Hara
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: The tang of lime and the dryness of cranberry balance the apricot sweetness of whiskey liqueur.
History: The cocktail that helped put Southern Comfort on the proverbial drink map. Created 1939 and named after the heroine of the film Gone With The Wind , released that same year.
Nutrition: One serving of Scarlett O'Hara contains 136 calories
